name: Big Ship Parking Simulator - Ocean Container Shipping Cargo Boat Game PRO
name_original: Big Ship Parking Simulator - Ocean Container Shipping Cargo Boat Game PRO
description:
Get ready for boat parking on a large scale. Ever wondered if you could pilot a massive ocean container ship? Think you got what it takes? Guide the huge ship to the parking space. Once parked, load the container onto the boat with the crane. Can you do it?

Features:
-Realistic 3D Graphics
-3 Container Ships to choose from
-Load Cargo with a Crane
